comments.text: Interesting find! While not directly about hyperbaric habitat materials, FIU's Aquarius program offers invaluable hands-on experience with underwater habitats, a crucial stepping stone for anyone aiming to build an underwater city.  The practical training aspect aligns perfectly with the stated focus on immediate, actionable experience in undersea environments.
